settings.heading: Discover the Magic of Better Sleep with Klova’s Sleep Patch – Start Your Free Trial
settings.subHeading:
Try Klova’s Original ZPatch on us!

Just cover $9.95 for shipping!

Unlock the secret to quicker, more peaceful sleep with our no-cost trial, featuring 8 patches ingeniously crafted to enhance your sleep quality.

settings.logo_subtitle: These patches are a tapestry of sleep-supportive elements, including melatonin, ashwagandha, valerian root, and a touch of calming lavender oil.
Our advanced formulation ensures a consistent, 8-hour stream of slumber-inducing nutrients.
Engage in the kind of deep sleep that leaves you energized and clear-headed at daybreak.

custom_css: .logo-bar__title {color: #1e062c; font-family: "Bergen Sans"; font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; line-height: 30px; text-align: left;}

settings.title: All-Natural Formula
settings.subtitle: Our patches are made with high-quality, natural ingredients that work with your body to promote better sleep.

settings.title: Fuss-Free Application
settings.subtitle: Peel, stick and set sail towards a night of uninterrupted rest, starting 30-60 minutes before bedtime.

settings.title: Skincare-Conscious
settings.subtitle: Tested for safety and comfort, our patches are latex-free and meticulously formulated to be gentle on all skin types.

settings.title: Why Klova’s Sleep Patch Is Your Nighttime Ally?

settings.logo_subtitle: Smoothly attach one patch to an area of skin that’s clean and moisture-free.
Allow the blend of natural soothers to lull your senses into a state of pre-sleep calm.
Experience the bliss of uninterrupted slumber and start your day with newfound vitality.

settings.heading: Why We’re Sharing the Klova Experience
settings.subHeading:
“We’re on a mission to revolutionize sleep, and nothing speaks louder than firsthand experiences. That’s why we’re offering this free trial—to let you discover the transformative power of the Klova Sleep Patch for yourself.

We’re confident that our approach to rest will resonate with you, making the Klova Sleep Patch a cherished addition to your nightly ritual. Dive into your trial today, completely on us, and reawaken to brighter mornings!”

settings.review_text: “One of the big reasons I love the Klova patch is because IT WORKS! The Klova patch introduced a new way where i only have one product with multiple ingredients and it helps me stay asleep.”
This guys, honestly helps with sleep! Like it really works! It takes me a long time to fall asleep but with this, I’m out in about 15-20min!Thank you @klovasleep for creating these amazing products!

THE KEY TO RESTFUL SLEEP💤 I do NOT mess around when it comes to sleep. Ya girl needs at LEAST 8 hours to function properly in the morning and to be productive. That’s why I’m currently obsessing over @klovasleep ZPatches

settings.question: What Duration does each patch last
settings.answer: A patch works its magic throughout the night, offering 8 hours of therapeutic release.

settings.question: Will there be any surprises later?
settings.answer: Our promise is straightforward: try Klova for free, no strings attached.

settings.question: Is it suitable for nightly use?
settings.answer: Yes, make Klova part of your sleep routine for consistent restorative rest.
